changelog.description:
The resource name of the changelog.
 Format: instances/{instance}/databases/{database}/changelogs/{changelog}

detail.description:
Below are the results of a task run.
 Detailed information about the task run result.

export_archive_status.description: The export archive status for data export tasks.
export_archive_status.title: Export Archive Status

prior_backup_detail.description: The prior backup detail that will be used to rollback the task run.

run_time.description:
The task run should run after run_time.
 This can only be set when creating the task run calling BatchRunTasks.

scheduler_info.description: Scheduling information about the task run.

schema_version.description: The schema version after this task run completes.

start_time.description: The time when the task run started execution.

status.description: The current execution status of the task run.
status.title: Status
